short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate words on the web page and pop-up the result by clicking right button with Alt-key. Requires:PDIC (external application)
short.ja: マウスでAlt+右クリックした単語をポップアップ表示します。要：PDIC(外部アプリ)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FirePop! and PDIC can translate not only a word but also a compound word and a conjugated word.
long.ja: Translate words on the web page and pop-up the result by clicking right button with Alt-key. Requires:PDIC (external application)
